title: Alduron
author: Alduron
content: - Groundforce channel:Join the Groundforce!A new channel was introduced on Discord, it is used by our Volunteers to post information and updates on social media. The AptosLaunch Community can participate and earn rewards- Spaceport voting concluded- Website overhaul completed:Our new UI for the Landing Page is now live, providing a more streamlined and user-friendly experience for all users.- new dashboard:We have added a dashboard that enables users to easily check out the current stats of AptosLaunch, including key metrics like IDO volume, liquidity, and more.- first DAO vote for BronzeLauncher+ happenedVoting function was open to all members with the Bronze Launcher role in our Discord community. If you haven’t earned this role yet, be sure to participate in our zealy missions and claim the role- SuilaunchIO bonding opportunity:for ALT holders with high staking yields to reward supporters, first project that introduced an IBO(initial bond offering) on MOVE$ALT holders - you can now swap your $ALT for $SLT with great rates at IBO - AptosLaunch- big ALT burn incoming:  50% of the bonded ALT will be burned.currently at round 13/60Hope you enjoyed the update, a lot of amazing stuff is in the pipeline + plans for upcoming IDOs to be revealed. Stay tuned and check the AptosLaunch Discord announcements for more details.

comments.author: TastyChillySauce00
comments.body: A horrible platform. - Very bad UI- Useless token- Dumped below the sale price which is now less than 5 cents.Aptos was building a good blockchain but its ecossytem like aptos launch was actually BS. There's no project interested to launch in this shit. Claimed to have 50+ VCs and funs. Who are stupid VCs make a collaboration with this shit?

comments.author: Alduron
comments.body: Quote from: aubert on May 22, 2023, 12:11:56 AMA horrible platform. - Very bad UI- Useless token- Dumped below the sale price which is now less than 5 cents.Aptos was building a good blockchain but its ecossytem like aptos launch was actually BS. There's no project interested to launch in this shit. Claimed to have 50+ VCs and funs. Who are stupid VCs make a collaboration with this shit? Just no.AptosLaunch is the #1 Launchpad on Aptos and what you write shows that you did not look into it properly.- Sure the UI can and will be improved, but it is not "very bad". - what you write about useless Token is just total FUD. Holding ALT will determine your IDO allocation,you can put it into a compound staking contract (one of the first on Aptos), this token reward pool is refilled by DeFi Roulette (powered by Aptos Dragons) and there will be other sources in the future. + there are many other use cases like voting, VIP Tiers with lot of benefits, you can read about it in the Docs.- the price dump does not determine the quality of a Project, incase you missed it:most altcoins dumped a lot more. ALT has trading pairs with APT (Aptos) so it makes sense that the $ price dumped after APT did.Look at what was achieved so far in such a short time, other Launchpads did not even list on 1 CEX, some had to delist.AptosLaunch is already listed on KuCoin, MEXC, and got trading pairs on DEXs like Pancake and Liquidswap.What you write about "Aptos was building a good blockchain" does not make any sense either.Aptos is still undergoing heavy development, same as the ecosystem projects and AptosLaunch is one of the first projects ( with Aptos since testnet )  and one of the highest quality ones with a huge community.Let's talk about the token price in about 6 months
